<h3 id="X30332">X(30332) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-HUTSON INTOUCH AND 2nd EHRMANN</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*a^3-5*(b+c)*a^2+(b-c)^2*a-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30332) = 4*X(1)-3*X(7) = 2*X(1)-3*X(390) = 5*X(1)-3*X(4312) = 7*X(1)-6*X(5542) = 8*X(1)-9*X(8236) = 10*X(1)-9*X(11038) = 5*X(1)-6*X(30331) = 6*X(1)-5*X(30340) = 3*X(1)-2*X(30424) = 5*X(7)-4*X(4312) = 7*X(7)-8*X(5542) = 2*X(7)-3*X(8236) = 5*X(7)-6*X(11038) = 5*X(7)-8*X(30331) = 9*X(7)-10*X(30340) = 9*X(7)-8*X(30424) = 3*X(8)-4*X(5220) = 2*X(8)-3*X(6172) = 5*X(390)-2*X(4312) = 7*X(390)-4*X(5542) = 4*X(390)-3*X(8236) = 2*X(5220)-3*X(5698) = 8*X(5220)-9*X(6172) = 4*X(5698)-3*X(6172)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(11477). X(30332) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30332) lies on these lines:
{1,7}, {2,9580}, {4,5766}, {8,190}, {9,3617}, {11,30312}, {12,10248}, {44,5838}, {45,5819}, {55,5226}, {56,30295}, {65,7671}, {100,5328}, {144,3621}, {145,527}, {149,5744}, {165,5274}, {329,2900}, {376,5126}, {404,1001}, {497,1155}, {517,10394}, {518,3644}, {938,6361}, {950,12848}, {954,5714}, {1000,28160}, {1004,1621}, {1056,28146}, {1159,3488}, {1445,5128}, {1479,5445}, {1697,3146}, {1699,5281}, {1788,9670}, {1836,10385}, {2098,14151}, {2346,5556}, {2478,2550}, {2801,5697}, {2898,3599}, {3057,15726}, {3058,3474}, {3149,15911}, {3241,28534}, {3243,20059}, {3245,18391}, {3434,5273}, {3487,10386}, {3522,12053}, {3523,9614}, {3524,7743}, {3528,11373}, {3529,9957}, {3579,5704}, {3601,30275}, {3614,7679}, {3616,5880}, {3622,6173}, {3625,5223}, {3626,5686}, {3826,7173}, {3869,12536}, {3877,5784}, {3878,5696}, {3912,4779}, {3923,5772}, {4440,15590}, {5046,6594}, {5059,7320}, {5204,7677}, {5218,9779}, {5265,12512}, {5528,20066}, {5657,9668}, {5703,12699}, {5729,5759}, {5762,8148}, {5817,18357}, {5825,21168}, {5851,12730}, {6006,21105}, {6767,28178}, {7672,14100}, {7962,30318}, {7987,18220}, {8240,30359}, {8241,30367}, {8242,30405}, {9578,17578}, {9814,30337}, {9819,28164}, {10005,25728}, {10866,30287}, {10896,19877}, {11041,28212}, {11220,17642}, {11372,29007}, {11529,28232}, {11924,30404}, {12527,12632}, {15933,28198}, {15934,28216}, {16020,24715}, {17314,28566}, {17538,24928}, {17781,20015}, {17784,18228}, {20533,29579}</p>
<p>
X(30332) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (7, 390), (8, 5698), (4312, 30331), (5696, 3878), (7672, 14100), (20059, 3243)<br>
X(30332) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (20, 9785, 4308), (20, 10624, 9785), (11200, 30334, 17805)<br>
X(30332) = outer-Garcia-to-inner-Garcia similarity image of X(7)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
